TopicTitle: Unable to change resolution or graphics settings

Articles.Content:
I can't change the resolution or window type on the main menu. It defaults to 4k windowed but when I change the settings and click apply, nothing happens. The same happens with the graphics settings, which are stuck on high, my computer can't really handle these settings so it my game never gets above 20 fps during flight. After relaunching the game, the settings don't keep my changes and are still have no effect. Also I can't load into saves, it just puts me on the main menu, without the menu or logo, only the background.

Going to try reinstalling

It seems like your user don't have the rights to write in the folder "%USERPROFILE%\AppData\LocalLow\Intercept Games\Kerbal Space Program 2" (or something like that, since it's in this folder that the configuration is saved).

Try to delete that folder and restart the game.
If the issue persists, check that your user has the rights to read / write that folder
